mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLY VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_seq}, #{board_p_seq}, #{reply_content}, SYSDATE, 1, #{user_seq}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT BR.REPLY_SEQ, BR.USER_SEQ, BR.BOARD_P_SEQ, BR.REPLY_CONTENT, BR.REG_DATE, UM.USER_NAME FROM BOARD_REPLY BR INNER JOIN USER_MEMBER UM ON BR.USER_SEQ = UM.USER_SEQ WHERE BR.EXP_YN = 1 AND BOARD_P_SEQ = #{board_p_seq} ORDER BY BR.REG_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET EXP_YN = 0 WHERE REPLY_SEQ = #{reply_seq}
